#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#define pb push_back
#define sz(c) c.size()
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef vector<string> vs;
#define mod 1000000007

/*static inline ll scan2()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}

static inline int scan1()
{
    int x=0;

    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}


static inline void WriteInt(long long int x)
{
    char s[15];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    l--;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l]);
        l--;
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
} */


bool comp(string s1,string s2)
{
    string t1=s1+s2;
    string t2=s2+s1;
    return(t1>t2);
}



int main()
{
 int T;
 int N;
 scanf("%d",&T);
 while(T--)
 {

     int i;
     vs V;
     string s;
     scanf("%d",&N);
     for(i=0;i<N;i++)
     {
      cin>>s;
      V.pb(s);
     }
     sort(V.begin(),V.end(),comp);
     for(vs::iterator it=V.begin();it!=V.end();it++)
     {
         cout<<(*it)<<"";
     }
     cout<<endl;
 }
 return 0;
}
